help.overview: This plugin provides authentication services for Perlbot
help.command:
Authenticates a user with the bot
Usage: auth username password

Changes a user's password
Usage: password newpassword

Lists a user's configured hostmasks
Usage: hostmasks

Adds a hostmask to the user's list of authorized hostmasks
Usage: addhostmask hostmasks

Deletes a hostmask from the user's list of authorized hostmasks
Usage: delhostmask hostmask
